{{Wireless embedded system |brand=RCA |model=DCW725 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/04/2007 |manuf_country= |manuf=Askey |manuf_model=CHE260-D49 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,cable modem |fcc_id=H8NDCW725 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3349 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K8D6316UBM-PI07 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V281620ETP-H |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4318 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325MA2 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=DOCSIS 2.0,schematics |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=THOMSON |default_ssid_regex=^THOMSON$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:11:E3 |oui_eth=00:11:E3 |default_ch= }} OEM Askey CHE260-D49, FCC ID listed on [http://forums.modem-help.co.uk/viewtopic.php?p=2666 this list on modem-help.co.uk]
"ID:38-000081 REV:0A" is silkscreened on the board. There is no FCC ID printed on the label of the device (or at least some devices).
==Images== <gallery> File:RCA DCW725 board top.jpg|board top File:RCA DCW725 board bot.jpg|board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
